Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Europa in Sesto San Giovanni (Northern Milan), you'll be convenient to Galleria Campari and Parco Nord Milano. This hotel is within close proximity of PalaSesto and University of Milano-Bicocca.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 31 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is noon
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is included.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby.

With a stay at Hotel Europa in Sesto San Giovanni (Northern Milan), you'll be convenient to Galleria Campari and Parco Nord Milano. This hotel is within close proximity of PalaSesto and University of Milano-Bicocca.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Galleria Campari - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Parco Nord Milano - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
PalaSesto - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
University of Milano-Bicocca - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Teatro degli Arcimboldi - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Pala Kart Cinisello Balsamo - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Vulcano Shopping Centre - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Auchan - 3 km / 1.8 mi
La Fontana Shopping Centre - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Niguarda Ca Granda Hospital - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
San Raffaele Hospital - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
National Institute of Nuclear Research - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Instituto Ortopedico Galeazzi - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Museo d'Arte Paolo Pini - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi
Piazzale Loreto - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Europa is Milan (LIN-Linate) - 8.9 km / 5.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
